Text: needs to be seeded long enough to create a swarm.. seed to 99.8% until you have dozens in the swarm at 99.8, then release the last 00.2% and have the swarm survive.. hit and runs are killing this
How exactly do I do that? I'm currently seeding with unlimited upload limit.

depends on the torrent client.. if you hold-back the last couple pieces until you have a couple dozen peers 99.8 done, the torrent will have a much better chance to live on its own.. or, seed it indefinitely

at any rate, thx!!
